contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.blogpos.BlogPostContentContentMarkdown:
We're thrilled to announce a new Kentico user group starting up next month in Chicago, Illinois, USA!
:::note Date: 2024/08/21
Time: 5:00 - 7:00 PM CST
Location: [Americaneagle.com Office](https://maps.app.goo.gl/qpwcKmzNGL3DK82p8)
2600 S. River Rd, Des Plaines, IL 60018 :::
Hosted by Americaneagle.com and featuring in-person presentations from Kentico MVP Wes McChristian, Kentico Practice VP at Americaneagle.com, and Sean Wright, Lead Product Evangelist at Kentico.
Wes will share how his clients improved their customer engagement and increased lead generation by defining goals and applying best practices for digital planning.
Sean will show how marketers can regain control of their content with a demo of the latest features in Xperience by Kentico and answer questions from the audience.
This is a great opportunity to network and learn from your peers. So, go ahead and [register for the event](https://www.kentico.com/discover/events/user-group-chicago)!
We hope to see you there.
